tool.name: Create a MuData object out of AnnData objects

configfiles.configfile:
@CMD_imports@ import muon as mu
mdata = mu.MuData({'rna': '$rna_input', 'atac': '$atac_input'}) mu.pp.intersect_obs(mdata) mdata.write("rna_atac.h5") #end if

tool.help: **What it does** Import MuData from AnnData is a tool that allows creating a muon.MuData object out of two AnnData objects for multimodal omics factorial analysis. Furthermore, it runs pp.intersect_obs to keep only entries present in both modalities (AnnData objects) in the final MuData file.
